short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool to check the average price from a build on the poe ninja website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool to check the average price from a build on the poe ninja website with download CSV option to check each item on the pathofexile.com market.
